data.title: Aggressive Sands Dash Refract
data.description: When executing the A Site, you can path with your Light Speed like so, to make it more difficult for Defenders to hold it.

data.title: Drop to Sands Refract Dash
data.description: Coordinate a split towards Sands with your teammates using this quick combination of utility.

data.title: Top A Site Execute Refract Dash
data.description: Clear the top of A Site with your dash when executing, as well as setting up a Refract to safely return back to A Main.
